<h2> **INTRODUCTION TO THE COURSE**</h2>
---
<p>
In this course we will learn about some basic statistical calculations using R programming language. This course is intended for non-statistical students/researchers.
At the end of the course you will be able to carry out some basic mathematical and statistical calculations for your assignments, project works etc.

_So, lets get started..._
